name: Golden Scepter
desc: You have never seen a more beautiful, golden scepter in all of your lifetime.  You can understand why this was so dear to Ma'go-Faan... and why he put a curse on it.
trap_desc: As you remove the scepter from it's case, the ground begins to shake with an ominous rumble. Before you can react, the dias you are on crumbles away beneath you, and you fall through the floor, landing in a dark new place.
